noun.description: An evening drum or bugle signal recalling soldiers to their quarters.
examples: a military tattoo takes place with clockwork precision

verb.description: Mark (a person or a part of the body) with an indelible design by inserting pigment into punctures in the skin.
examples: his cheek was tattooed with a winged fist

origin: Mid 18th century: from Tahitian, Tongan, and Samoan ta-tau or Marquesan ta-tu.
